sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnbatchschduldfk ( BATCH_SCHDUL_ID /* */ , EXECUT_SCHDUL_DFK_SE /* */ ) VALUES ( #batchSchdulId# /* */ , #executSchdulDfkSe# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnbatchschduldfk SET BATCH_SCHDUL_ID=#batchSchdulId# /* */ , EXECUT_SCHDUL_DFK_SE=#executSchdulDfkSe# /* */ WHERE BATCH_SCHDUL_ID=#batchSchdulId# /* */ AND EXECUT_SCHDUL_DFK_SE=#executSchdulDfkSe# /* */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnbatchschduldfk WHERE BATCH_SCHDUL_ID=#batchSchdulId# /* */ AND EXECUT_SCHDUL_DFK_SE=#executSchdulDfkSe# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT BATCH_SCHDUL_ID /* */ , EXECUT_SCHDUL_DFK_SE /* */ FROM comtnbatchschduldfk WHERE BATCH_SCHDUL_ID=#batchSchdulId# /* */ AND EXECUT_SCHDUL_DFK_SE=#executSchdulDfkSe# /* */

SELECT BATCH_SCHDUL_ID /* */ , EXECUT_SCHDUL_DFK_SE /* */ FROM comtnbatchschduldfk WHERE 1=1
BATCH_SCHDUL_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
EXECUT_SCHDUL_DFK_SE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY BATCH_SCHDUL_ID DESC /* */ , EXECUT_SCHDUL_DFK_SE DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnbatchschduldfk WHERE 1=1
BATCH_SCHDUL_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
EXECUT_SCHDUL_DFK_SE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
